description:
Remaining turnover tax / surplus

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73321 Turnover tax statistics (assessments)

Definition:
Applying the tax rates to the assessment basis (= turnover)
provides the turnover tax. When deductible input tax and
reductions have been taken into account, there will remain
turnover tax payable towards the local tax office in most
cases. It is shown in turnover tax statistics (assessments).
Deducting from this amount the advance payments made for the
year will provide the final payment or the amount of refund
arising towards the cash office.
